author: rwatler
msg: APA-9: integrate apa-logging via use of org.apache.portals.logdir system property in log4j.properties; remove logging within webapp

author: rwatler
msg: APA-9 - Log4j logging refactor using apa-logging
- Add "edits" capability to jetspeed-deploy-maven-plugin that allows arbitrary files to
be edited in place during deployment.
- Add "edit" entry to demo deployment configurations to edit tomcat server.xml configuration
to hook apa-logging listeners used to setup the org.apache.portals.logdir system property.

author: gbrown
msg: Update demos to using binding annotations; add x and y setters to Component; use two leading dashes for startup property names in DesktopApplicationContext.

author: kai
msg: - changed the sql-map-config-2.dtd as proposed: sqlMap is now optional

author: jim
msg: Optimization... for large slotmems, it would be useful to know
which ones are actually "in use"... So flag this. Need a way
to de-allocate a slot for completeness I think, but am having
a hard time coming up with a use case...
